divs: sighting detailson many occasions,and mostly when i am taking my son to early athletics practice, we have observed a large, white, circular object in the east\southeast sky. at first, i attempted to disclaim it as a planet,star, plane or aircraft of some kind. due to its minor movement, its not always being their and its location in the sky changes, i have come to realize it is an unidentified whatever. i have witnessed ufos, as a child, but have not again until the last year. i also have resently observed a larger, orange, circular object in the western, northwestern sky, early to late evening while driving home up hwy 67. although, i am now seeing alot of people coming forward with sightings in the area, i believe these sightings have been going on for around a year. the sightings i have witness could have been dismissed as something else yet i know differently. i have recently, and for the first time considered viewing them thru the telescope.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Alvarado
There were no other sightings in Alvarado on or around March 2nd 2007
Summary: Many mornings a circular shape apears in the east/south east sky
